      Tests a situation where a switch returns a QUARANTINE result.
      abstract void moveToWaitAppHandshakeState()
      Move the channel from scratch to WaitAppHandshakeState Different for OF1.0 and OF1.3 because of GenTables.
      void moveToWaitConfigReply()
      Move the channel from scratch to WAIT_CONFIG_REPLY state adds testing for beginHandshake() which moves the state from InitState to WaitConfigReply.
      void moveToWaitDescriptionStatReply()
      Move the channel from scratch to WAIT_DESCRIPTION_STAT_REPLY state Builds on moveToWaitConfigReply() adds testing for WAIT_CONFIG_REPLY state

      Move the channel from scratch to WaitInitialRole Different for OF1.0 and OF1.3 because of Controller Connections.

      Move the channel from scratch to WaitSwitchDriverSubHandshake Different for OF1.0 and OF1.3 because of GenTables.

      void setUpFeaturesReply() 
      void tearDown()

      Tests the connection closed functionality after the switch handshake is complete.
      void testConnectionClosedBeforeHandshakeComplete()
      Tests the connection closed functionality before the switch handshake is complete.
      void testInitialMoveToMasterNoRole()
      Move the channel from scratch to MASTER state Builds on doMoveToWaitInitialRole() adds testing for WAIT_INITAL_ROLE state This method tests the case that the switch does NOT support roles.
      void testInitialMoveToMasterTimeout()
      Move the channel from scratch to MASTER state Builds on doMoveToWaitInitialRole() adds testing for WAIT_INITAL_ROLE state We let the initial role request time out.
      void testInitialMoveToMasterWithRole()
      Move the channel from scratch to MASTER state Builds on doMoveToWaitInitialRole() adds testing for WAIT_INITAL_ROLE state This method tests only the simple case that the switch supports roles and transitions to MASTER
      void testInitialMoveToSlaveNoRole()
      Move the channel from scratch to SLAVE state Builds on doMoveToWaitInitialRole() adds testing for WAIT_INITAL_ROLE state This method tests the case that the switch does NOT support roles.
      void testInitialMoveToSlaveTimeout()
      Move the channel from scratch to SLAVE state Builds on doMoveToWaitInitialRole() adds testing for WAIT_INITAL_ROLE state We let the initial role request time out.
      void testInitialMoveToSlaveWithRole()
      Move the channel from scratch to SLAVE state Builds on doMoveToWaitInitialRole() adds testing for WAIT_INITAL_ROLE state This method tests only the simple case that the switch supports roles and transitions to SLAVE
      void testInitialRoleChangeOtherError()
      Start from scratch and reply with an unexpected error to the role change request Builds on doMoveToWaitInitialRole() adds testing for WAIT_INITAL_ROLE state
      void testInitState()
      Move the channel from scratch to INIT state This occurs upon creation of the switch handler
      void testMessageDispatchMaster()
      Test dispatch of messages while in MASTER role

      • moveQuarantine

        public void moveQuarantine()
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Tests a situation where a switch returns a QUARANTINE result. This means we should move the handshake handler to a quarantine state and also quarantine the switch in the controller.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • failedAppHandshake

        public void failedAppHandshake()
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Tests a situation where a plugin returns a DISCONNECT result. This means we should disconnect the connection and the state should not change.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • testInitialMoveToMasterNoRole

        public void testInitialMoveToMasterNoRole()
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Move the channel from scratch to MASTER state Builds on doMoveToWaitInitialRole() adds testing for WAIT_INITAL_ROLE state This method tests the case that the switch does NOT support roles. The channel handler still needs to send the initial request to find out that whether the switch supports roles.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • testInitialMoveToMasterTimeout

        public void testInitialMoveToMasterTimeout()
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Move the channel from scratch to MASTER state Builds on doMoveToWaitInitialRole() adds testing for WAIT_INITAL_ROLE state We let the initial role request time out. Role support should be disabled but the switch should be activated.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • testInitialMoveToSlaveNoRole

        public void testInitialMoveToSlaveNoRole()
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Move the channel from scratch to SLAVE state Builds on doMoveToWaitInitialRole() adds testing for WAIT_INITAL_ROLE state This method tests the case that the switch does NOT support roles. The channel handler still needs to send the initial request to find out that whether the switch supports roles.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • testInitialMoveToSlaveTimeout

        public void testInitialMoveToSlaveTimeout()
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Move the channel from scratch to SLAVE state Builds on doMoveToWaitInitialRole() adds testing for WAIT_INITAL_ROLE state We let the initial role request time out. The switch should be disconnected
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • testNoRoleInitialToMasterToSlave

        public void testNoRoleInitialToMasterToSlave()
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Move channel from scratch to WAIT_INITIAL_STATE, then MASTER, then SLAVE for cases where the switch does not support roles. I.e., the final SLAVE transition should disconnect the switch.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • testConnectionClosedBeforeHandshakeComplete

        public void testConnectionClosedBeforeHandshakeComplete()
